author: veithen
msg: * Consuming the reader returned by getXMLStreamReaderWithoutCaching should not built SOAPHeaderBlocks if they are not backed by OMDataSources. Modified OMNavigator to handle this case.
* Fixed the StAXBuilder#discard(OMElement) method. It didn't ajust the elementLevel correctly. Note that this issue only manifested itself after the previous issue was fixed.

author: grobmeier
msg: some css and images to successfully create the website

author: jleroux
msg: Cleaned up some code that was adding the delegator/dispatcher/security/auth objects in the user session rather than the request;
1) removed the request-maps for changeDelegator from components' controller.xml files: they were not used
2) removed CoreEvents.changeDelegator(...): not used (apart from the request-maps removed at #1)
4) cleaned up some code (related to multitenant development): now the objects are set in the request rather than the session
PS: as a consequence this will also fix the issue reported in OFBIZ-4289

author: jleroux
msg: Closes "Login out on a cluster handled by DeltaManager causes a NPE" https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/OFBIZ-4289
Removes all changes related to this issue. We will see later if ever it proves to be a real issue.
